description: Detects windows executables that writes files with suspicious extensions
name: Windows Binaries Write Suspicious Extensions
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\rundll32.exe OR *\\smss.exe OR *\\RuntimeBroker.exe OR *\\sihost.exe OR *\\lsass.exe OR *\\csrss.exe OR *\\winlogon.exe OR *\\wininit.exe) AND file.path.text:(*.bat OR *.vbe OR *.txt OR *.vbs OR *.exe OR *.ps1 OR *.hta OR *.iso))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
